metaTitle: BENJOTAR VILLAS M20 Benijofar | 3-Bed Villas from €589,000
metaDescription: Discover BENJOTAR VILLAS M20 in Benijofar, Alicante. Modern 3-bedroom villas from €589,000 by FEO HOME SPAIN. Complete April 2026. Prime Costa Blanca location.

content.heroIntro: BENJOTAR VILLAS M20 represents an exceptional opportunity to own a modern villa in the sought-after Pueblo area of Benijofar, Alicante. Developed by FEO HOME SPAIN, this exclusive project offers 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom villas starting from €589,000, combining contemporary design with exceptional value. Each villa spans 120m² of built space on generous 414m² plots, featuring high-quality finishes and modern amenities. With completion scheduled for April 2026, these properties are ideally positioned within an established international community, just minutes from pristine Blue Flag beaches and championship golf courses. The development reflects FEO HOME SPAIN's commitment to creating homes that offer both lifestyle appeal and solid investment potential in one of Costa Blanca's most dynamic markets.

locationSection.intro: Benijofar's Pueblo district offers an authentic Costa Blanca lifestyle with modern convenience. This charming town balances traditional Spanish culture with cosmopolitan amenities, attracting international buyers seeking genuine community living. The area benefits from excellent connectivity to major attractions while maintaining peaceful residential character. Residents enjoy proximity to world-class beaches, championship golf courses, and comprehensive healthcare facilities. The established expat community ensures English is widely spoken, facilitating seamless integration. Shopping facilities cater to all needs, from international supermarkets to local markets, while the surrounding region offers abundant dining and entertainment options.
highlights: Beach: Multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes drive
Golf: Several championship courses nearby including prestigious layouts
Hospital: Regional hospital within 30 minutes, private clinics available
Shopping: Mercadona, Lidl, Consum, local markets within 10 minutes
Restaurants: Diverse dining from traditional tapas to international cuisine throughout the region

propertyFeatures.intro: BENJOTAR VILLAS M20 exemplifies modern Spanish villa design with premium construction standards. FEO HOME SPAIN has prioritized quality throughout, incorporating energy-efficient systems, contemporary aesthetics, and functional layouts. Each villa is built to exceed current building regulations, featuring robust structural design and durable materials. The properties showcase professional finishes across all areas, from kitchens equipped with modern appliances to bathrooms featuring contemporary fixtures. Climate control systems and smart design elements ensure year-round comfort in the Mediterranean climate.
features: Private swimming pool with modern filtration
Air conditioning pre-installation ready for easy setup
Fitted kitchen with quality appliances included
Double glazing with thermal break for energy efficiency
Private parking space for each villa

content.investmentSection: BENJOTAR VILLAS M20 presents compelling investment fundamentals. The Benijofar market demonstrates consistent growth with property values appreciating 8% year-on-year, outpacing broader Spanish averages. At €2,200 per square meter, prices remain 40% below comparable Spanish island markets, offering exceptional value. Rental yields are attractive, with comparable properties achieving €800 per week in the holiday rental market. The established international community provides strong tenant demand for both long-term rentals and vacation stays. As Costa Blanca continues gaining prominence among European buyers seeking Mediterranean lifestyle and investment opportunity, Benijofar's strategic positioning ensures sustained appreciation potential.
whyBuySection: Strategic location in Pueblo with authentic Spanish village character
Trusted developer FEO HOME SPAIN with proven track record in the region
Spacious 414m² plots with private swimming pools and mature gardens
Modern 3-bedroom layouts with flexible living spaces perfect for families or rental investment
Delivery: April 1, 2026 with structured payment schedule
Established international community where English is commonly spoken
Easy access to multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes
Proximity to several championship golf courses for leisure and lifestyle

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in BENJOTAR VILLAS M20?
faqs.answer: Properties start from €589,000. This includes 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom villas with 120m² of built space on 414m² plots. Current availability is limited, so we recommend contacting us immediately for details and viewing opportunities.

faqs.question: When will BENJOTAR VILLAS M20 be completed?
faqs.answer: Completion is scheduled for April 1, 2026. FEO HOME SPAIN provides a 10-year structural warranty on all homes. Specific delivery dates and possession schedules are available upon inquiry.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of BENJOTAR VILLAS M20?
faqs.answer: FEO HOME SPAIN is the developer. They have established a strong reputation building quality residential properties throughout Benijofar and the Costa Blanca region, with expertise in creating homes for the international market.

faqs.question: Is Benijofar a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Benijofar benefits from an established international community where English is commonly spoken, making integration seamless. Property values show consistent 8% year-on-year appreciation. The area offers excellent amenities including a regional hospital within 30 minutes and multiple Blue Flag beaches within 20 minutes, combined with strong rental demand.

faqs.question: How far is BENJOTAR VILLAS M20 from the beach?
faqs.answer: Multiple Blue Flag beaches are within 20 minutes' drive, providing easy access to Mediterranean coastline. The development's location offers the perfect balance between beach proximity and peaceful residential living away from tourist congestion.

faqs.question: What amenities are near BENJOTAR VILLAS M20?
faqs.answer: Nearby amenities include major supermarkets (Mercadona, Lidl, Consum), regional hospital within 30 minutes with private clinics available, several championship golf courses, and diverse dining options. The area features excellent infrastructure supporting international residents.

content.conclusion: BENJOTAR VILLAS M20 represents a rare opportunity to invest in quality Mediterranean property with proven appreciation potential. The combination of FEO HOME SPAIN's reputation, strategic Benijofar location, modern amenities, and exceptional value creates an compelling proposition for buyers seeking lifestyle and investment return. Whether you're relocating to Costa Blanca or expanding your property portfolio, these villas offer the perfect blend of comfort, community, and financial opportunity. Contact our team via WhatsApp today for detailed information, viewing availability, and personalized investment consultation. Our bilingual experts are ready to guide you through every step of your property purchase journey.
